fullText: This sleek, stripped-down revival of the Kander and Ebb musical transforms what was once a bloated Broadway spectacle into a lean, mean entertainment machine.
dtliExcerpt: This sleek, stripped-down revival of the Kander and Ebb musical transforms what was once a bloated Broadway spectacle into a lean, mean entertainment machine.

keyPhrases.quote: transforms what was once a bloated Broadway spectacle
